article

Fortune 500 Grainger Features Waste Metering Impact in 2021 ESG Report

article

Hear it from Apple: “We were overestimating waste.”

video

Live on CNN: Why McDonald’s restaurants are putting cameras in their dumpsters

COVERED BY THE BEST

Container data to steer your operations

Container data to steer your operations

  • Fullness

    Monitor how full it is.

  • Fullness

    Monitor how full it is.

  • Content

    See what’s inside.

  • Content

    See what’s inside.

  • Location

    Track where it is.

  • Location

    Track where it is.

  • Activity

    Know what’s happening.

  • Activity

    Know what’s happening.

Enhance your ESG reporting

See how leading companies, including Apple, ADT and Planet Fitness, are using Compology waste metering data to quantify their commitment to environmental responsibility and sustainability.
Read more

Smart cameras. Artificial intelligence. Automatic Impact.

  • Waste metering
  • Trailer monitoring
  • Partnerships

Smart cameras built for waste & recycling

In-dumpster cameras and AI-powered waste meteringTM technology automatically monitor and detect fullness, content, location and activity, so you know what’s happening at every dumpster.

Learn how it works

Smart cameras built for waste & recycling

In-dumpster cameras and AI-powered waste meteringTM technology automatically monitor and detect fullness, content, location and activity, so you know what’s happening at every dumpster.

Learn how it works

Tough cameras built for trucking

In-trailer cameras and artificial intelligence automatically monitor fullness, floor space, location and activity, so you know what’s happening across your fleet.

Learn how it works

Tough cameras built for trucking

In-trailer cameras and artificial intelligence automatically monitor fullness, floor space, location and activity, so you know what’s happening across your fleet.

Learn how it works

Container data Powered by Compology

Open APIs power any in-house or third-party software by plugging container fullness, content, location and activity data directly in the platform you already use.

Learn how it works
